hospice & palliative care

Personalized hospice care & nursing services

Experts in helping seniors live well at home.

Explore Care Options
1-800-123-1234

We offer the best care in life’s difficult times

for you and your loved ones

Insurance Accepted

Insurance Accepted

We ensure you have access to our quality care services as we accept insurance plans to cover your healthcare costs.

Dedicated to providing comfort and skilled care

We are committed to providing gentle and nurturing end-of-life services for families and their loved ones to bring comfort and relief during difficult times. We provide full-service hospice care with no out-of-pocket expenses.

Hospice care not only addresses a patient’s physical needs, but it also provides addresses the patient’s emotional, psychological, and spiritual needs as well.

More About Us

When is hospice care appropriate?

Hospice care can be considered when faced with a life-limiting illness and a cure is no longer the goal. 

Patients are eligible for hospice care when a physician determines that, given the natural course of the illness, life expectancy is six months or less.

Find Out More

My experience with Harmony Care exceeded all expectations. The caregivers not only attended to my father's medical needs but also showed genuine care and friendliness, greatly improving his quality of life.

Sarah H.

Our Services

View All Services

Our skilled team of medical professionals is here for you

A physician must recommend hospice care in order to be eligible for this assistance. Since care for these individuals is specialized and requires various levels of treatment, our team of professionals tending to your loved one includes:

  • Physicians;
  • Nurse Practitioners;
  • Registered Nurses;
  • Licensed Practical Nurses;
  • Social Workers
  • Spiritual & Bereavement Counselors;
  • On-Call Nurses for 24/7 Crisis Support.
Meet the Team

"I simply wanted to say thank you and express my gratitude for how professional and kind you all were in every situation. You are clearly experienced in such an environment and my Grandmother and family were very lucky to have you involved in her situation.”

Sarah H.Family member

I have been living here for a few months and I love the friendly staff and residents. We have a lot of activities available and one of my favorite things to do is movie night together.

Alison R.Resident

My mom moved there two years ago and is very happy there. The staff is pleasant, helpful and caring and they treat him like family. The management does a good job of keeping us informed on matters related to the facility and any impact on residents.

Jane D.Family of a resident
